attributes.action: For an enquiry into the BBC's lack of impartiality.
attributes.additional_details: The use of emotive language, manipulation of images, partiality and saturation coverage given to the pro-immigration viewpoint do not concur with the requirement for this publicly-funded organisation to report in a balanced and impartial manner.
attributes.background: The BBC has demonstrated a complete lack of impartiality in it's recent reporting of the Migration crisis in Europe.
